topic.name: Foundations of Drawing & Observational Skill
topic.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Foundations of Drawing & Observational Skill in Fine Arts

objectives.sub_subject_name: Visual Arts (Drawing, Painting, Design & Aesthetic Training)
